definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
the ancient Silk Road/see also 絲綢之路|丝绸之路[Si1 chou2 zhi1 Lu4]

sentences.english: The wrinkled silk will flatten out if you iron it.
sentences.chinese: 发皱的丝绸可以用熨斗烫平。

sentences.english: It was a stopping point on the famous Silk Road between the East and the West .
sentences.chinese: 当时它是连接东西方的著名丝绸之路上的一个歇脚点。

sentences.english: The beautiful silks and velvets surprised him very much.
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的丝绸及天鹅绒令他赞叹不已。

sentences.english: At times, kingfisher feathers have achieved the status of gemstones, silk, and spices.
sentences.chinese: 有的时候，翠鸟的羽毛和宝石，丝绸，香料一样值钱。

sentences.english: We can only supply you with 20000 yards of pure silk.
sentences.chinese: 咱们只能供给二万码的伪丝绸。

sentences.english: I wonder how the bodiless silk Buddha is made?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道脱胎丝绸佛是怎么做的？

sentences.english: About half of the road runs across Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: “丝绸之路”约有一半的路段位于新疆内。

sentences.english: Brocade is a class of richly decorative shuttle-woven fabrics, often made in colored silks with  gold and silver threads.
sentences.chinese: 锦是一种华美的织物，由染色的丝绸和金银线织成。

sentences.english: Many mummies have been found in the Silk Road.
sentences.chinese: 在丝绸之路发现了许多木乃伊。

sentences.english: Young women were always interested in the trends of fashion, She was tricked to buy a scarf made of a triangular piece of blue silk.
sentences.chinese: 她被哄骗买了一条三角形的兰色丝绸围巾。

sentences.english: It was not just merchandise, technology and culture that passed along the Silk Road .
sentences.chinese: 从丝绸之路而来的不仅是商品，工艺和文化。

sentences.english: The Silk Road always started from Loyang the ancient capital of China.
sentences.chinese: 丝绸之路一直是从中国的古都洛阳开始。

sentences.english: It's the conjunction of Europe and Asia, the end of the 'Silk Road'
sentences.chinese: 它是欧洲和亚洲的连接点，是丝绸之路之终点。

sentences.english: Kublai's kingdom was not only about the Silk Road over land.
sentences.chinese: 忽必烈时代不仅仅是只有“丝绸之路”。

sentences.english: A lot of cottons and silks are cool but they wrinkle easily.
sentences.chinese: 很多纯棉和丝绸都很凉快，就是很容易起皱。

definition: item made from woven silk or rayon
